item.title: Apple Inc 10-K
item.description: Apple Inc, which is in the Electronic Computers [3571] industry, SEC 10-K filing on October 28, 2022 had 20679 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 815 instances 2022 - 296 instances financial - 179 instances notes - 166 instances products - 165 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
